Everything you need to know about being a BC GAME VIP

Ready to take your online betting experience to the next level? At BC GAME, you are appreciated and rewarded handsomely with the site’s online casino VIP program. As the premier crypto casino and bookmaker, BC GAME caters to every player’s betting needs by offering various betting options and bonuses. These will help bettors maximise their online gaming experience by boosting their chances of winning bigger and better prizes.

The BC GAME VIP experience is one of a kind. There are exclusive rewards to be unlocked, such as secret chests and free coins. The more you play, the better and bigger the prizes are. What are you waiting for? Sign up and start playing now, and don’t miss out on the fun chances to win more here at BC GAME!

What is a VIP Casino?

VIP Casinos are betting platforms that offer online casino loyalty programs that reward active and loyal players. As a casino VIP, you will receive exclusive promotional offers and generous bonuses based on your tier. These programs are commonly based on points. The more you have, the better rewards you will earn. If you are a high roller that places high stakes, you will progress in the levels faster.

At BC GAME, enjoy a luxury experience as an online casino VIP. Depending on your preferences, you can use your earned rewards from the program at either the online casino or sportsbook. Make sure to take full advantage of these to boost your odds of winning huge prizes.

How to Become a BC GAME Casino VIP

Becoming a VIP at BC GAME is easy as you automatically enrol in its program! Read the terms and conditions before signing up, as there are wagering requirements.

To get started, you must visit the BC GAME website, create an account, and click the sign-up button. You can reach VIP level 1 just by wagering a dollar, equivalent to one experience point. It’s as simple as that! Get more rewards and incentives as you climb the higher tiers.

After signing up, a free Lucky Spin will be awaited in the right corner of your screen. Players are given one free spin every day. You can win rewards, such as JB coins, free bets, and the like.

Play VIP Casino Games at BC GAME

Online gambling is fun at BC GAME with its fantastic selection of VIP casino slots, table games, and live dealer games. Play with real money and get the chance to double, triple, or even quadruple your earnings while increasing your VIP level.

BC GAME VIP Slot Games

BC GAME has the best slots VIP players can enjoy. Varying in paytables and themes, explore your options and find the best one for you! Here is a breakdown of some VIP slots games you can play on the site:

Wild Spin (Platipus)

Bringing you through the neon-filled casinos of Las Vegas, Wild Spin features classic symbols, giving you the traditional slot game experience. The game has 5 reels, 25 paylines, and a jackpot to be won. With an RTP of 95%, start spinning its reels and win through its multitude of bonuses.

Sugar Rush (Pragmatic Play)

Ready to feel a sugary rush with this slot game's big payouts? Enjoy quick win mechanics with Pragmatic Play's sweet release. It has tons of fantastic features, such as tumbles and cluster pays. As a slot VIP, you get the chance to win x5000 your stake the more you play. The game has aN RTP of 96.5%, 7 reels, and an all-ways payline.

Hand of Anubis (Hacksaw Gaming)

Hacksaw Gaming is at the top of the game regarding themed slots, and Hand of Anubis is a prime example of this feat. As an online casino high roller, you can enjoy this popular Egyptian theme and win x10000 your stake. It is set on a 5x6 grid and has a 96.24% RTP percentage.

BC GAME VIP Table Games

Play live casino games for an exciting and engaging experience where you can interact with a live dealer. Besides their selection of slot games, BC GAME also has many VIP table games. Here are some recommended ones for VIP players:

Dragon Tiger (Evolution Gaming)

Dragon Tiger is an oriental-themed game that puts a twist on traditional baccarat. It introduces new card values and mechanics, transforming a classic game into a spectacular betting experience filled with more chances of winning. If you love baccarat, this is a must-try game to pick up.

Blackjack Lobby (Pragmatic Play)

Enjoy a game of classic blackjack live with Pragmatic Play. VIPs enjoy a more luxurious experience as they have higher limits and a differently decorated table, but the gameplay remains otherwise the same. Earn more through the game's side bets, such as Perfect Pairs and 21+3.

Casino Hold’em (Vivo Gaming)

Casino Hold 'em is a popular poker variant that is loved by many. Vivo Gaming takes the game to higher peaks with its available side bets. Play poker with a live dealer and enjoy an authentic and thrilling experience.

Conclusion

BC GAME’s VIP loyalty program is one of the best ones out there. It offers many ways for players to profit more through its plethora of rewards and benefits. Climb through the tiers and reach Diamond (SVIP) for a better and grander experience by playing VIP slot games.

FAQs

The BC GAME online casino membership entails many things. If you have any inquiries, here is an overview of common questions that may help:

How to earn VIP status in online casino programs?

Getting the VIP status is easy at BC GAME! Once you create an account, you are already enrolled in its online casino VIP program. All you have to do is make a deposit and play as many games as you want. VIP level 1 only requires one experience point, equal to one dollar played with.

Why upgrade to SVIP AT BC GAME?
SVIPs have it the best at BC GAME. Aside from the ordinary Rakeback and Recharges, SVIPs also enjoy the highest level of Luckyspin, Weekly/Monthly Bonuses, and the fastest channel for deposit and withdrawal. An SVIP also gains the chance to participate in the top players’ exchange conference and suggest new features & functions to the BC team as they build the best crypto casino together.
How to use VIP points?

Once you earn more VIP points at BC GAME, the more rewards you will receive in return. Gain more points by wagering on your favourite casino games or betting on sports. Once you reach certain milestones, you can access secret treasures and JB Coins, which you can use on the site.

What is a casino VIP host?
A VIP host is a manager that helps you with all your concerns when betting and playing at BC GAME. You can easily access them through telegram or email, depending on your preferred method. VIP hosts also provide you with reward codes if you are SVIP. You can use these at BC GAME, which will give you access to more bonuses.
What is a VIP rewards code?
VIP reward codes are given to players who have reached the diamond tier (SVIPs). Exclusive VIP hosts will provide these players with reward codes that will make you feel like an actual celebrity with the bonuses you will receive.
How to know if I am a BC GAME VIP?

Creating an account at BC GAME already lets you enjoy online casino loyalty programs. Your first game played with real money will promote you to VIP level 1, where you will receive JB Coins you can use on the site’s casino games or sportsbook.
